EmailTemplate.name: Product-Nurture1-new!.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Get the most out of your VMTurbo trial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We’ve built out an Evaluation Resource Center <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/evaluation-resource-center/> to guide you through the evaluation process and, of course, you can always reach support <http://support.vmturbo.com/home> for assistance.
Here are the top 6 things you can do to get the most our of your VMTurbo evaluation:
- Check out the Test Drive Tips <http://www.vmturbo.com/eval-tips/> - Familiarize yourself with the resources in the Evaluation Resource Center <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/evaluation-resource-center/> - Let us guide your evaluation in a phased approach with instructive evaluation tutorials <http://www.vmturbo.com/eval-tutorials/> - Learn more about VMTurbo’s Economic Scheduling Engine by watching a short video <http://www.vmturbo.com/esevideo/> - Schedule a demo <http://go.vmturbo.com/request-a-demo.html> with a support engineer who can review metrics and analyze the setup of your virtual environment in real time; answer questions and troubleshoot technical issues; and demonstrate and provide tips on how to use VMTurbo effectively - Contact support <http://support.vmturbo.com/home> if you run into a problem or have a question
I will continue to check in throughout the evaluation period to make sure you get the most out of your VMTurbo trial. I look forward to working with you.
Thank you,
VMTurbo
